2.rationale:
I'll aim for the closest apple at (6,7), which is only 3 moves away from our current head at (7,9). From here, our valid options are LEFT (to (6,9)), DOWN (to (7,8)), or RIGHT (to (8,9)), since moving UP would hit the wall.

Strategy hint for next turn: after moving LEFT and heading toward (6,7), keep tracking the apple's position and plan moves that avoid any potential traps or enemy collisions.
